definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The Austrians had similar posts on the mountains across the valley.
sentences.chinese: 在峽谷對面的山上，奧軍也有類似的戰地指揮所。

sentences.english: The team's field headquarters that night would be an empty building on the very edge of town.
sentences.chinese: 別動隊當晚的戰地指揮部就設在城邊的一座空樓裏。

sentences.english: You want to win and comrade-in-arms with the crown the god of war you?
sentences.chinese: 你想和戰友一起摘取戰地之神的桂冠嗎？

sentences.english: In the Marco Polo Bridge Incident, she organized the women to go to frontline services.
sentences.chinese: 在蘆溝橋事變後，她組織婦女戰地服務團赴前線服務。

sentences.english: Now the AFS (Allied Free Sentients ), the galaxy's last free sentient beings, are on the verge of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 現在，戰地服務團，銀河的最後衆生瀕臨絕種。

sentences.english: The Israeli military correspondent who accompanied the soldiers said they were concerned about Hamas booby-traps.
sentences.chinese: 以色列戰地記者說他們最擔心的是哈馬斯的陷阱。

sentences.english: There, a monastery and a field hospital are held by one side then the other.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，一座修道院和一個戰地醫院頻繁易守。

sentences.english: BF2 defaults the server type to conquest.
sentences.chinese: 戰地2的服務器搜索默認是征服模式。

sentences.english: Has the field cook been added yet?
Were they field hands or house servants?
sentences.chinese: 他們是在戰地裏幹活還是管家僕人？

sentences.english: He was transferred to a field hospital at a nearby plantation to recover.
sentences.chinese: 他被轉送到種植園附近一家戰地醫院裏康復。

sentences.english: No President in the field hospital to assist party together to make Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 長孫無蓉在戰地醫院協助方神醫救死扶傷。

sentences.english: Fiberboard or V-board containers did not prove practical for field use.
sentences.chinese: 纖維板或V板容器證明並不適合實際在戰地使用。

sentences.english: The Death Skulls warriors are renowned as plunderers of the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 死頭氏族的兵士們有戰地劫掠者的名頭。

sentences.english: It has come up with a sandwich fit for the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 一種戰地三明治問世了。

sentences.english: This expansion pack will be available post launch of Battlefield 3.
sentences.chinese: 該擴展包在《戰地3》發售後可用。

pinyin: Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
Pacific War between Japan and the US, 1941-1945
an expedition, esp. military/march to remote regions
